title: WTB T206 Lajoie Portrait Raw or SGC 20-40
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Lajoie Portrait Raw or SGC 20-40
posts.post_content:
Looking for an example of this card that presents nicely. Back damage okay. An SGC 10 with heavy back damage and a nice front would be fine as well. Raw must guarantee to numerically grade with SGC. 

Thanks.

Scott
